Description:
Move In or Add To Your Portfolio

Whatever your intention, this exciting opportunity demands your immediate inspection.

Description:
Victorian Splendour, Family Flavour
$540,000 - $590,000
After 40 years in the same family, the famed Kleinert Homestead is seeking new owners to eenjoy its historic beauty and spacious grounds. Dating back to the 1890s, this authentic Victorian brick and weatherboard home retains its original charm and genuine character features of soaring ceilings, sash windows, corbels, arches, ceiling roses and gleaming polished floorboards.
Boasting 5 bedrooms, 4 feature open fireplaces including the impressive master bedroom/parlour and a well equipped family bathroom. The large farmhouse kitchen adjoins a spacious lounge and dining room reminiscent of Victorian glamour.
Sitting upon approximately 1,822 sq m of land, this exquisite homestead has a Heritage listed slab hut, built by Martin Kleinert in 1880, with the backyard also offering a double garage with drive through access for boat or caravan storage. Sheds and an original dome brick well are shaded by Cypress trees.
In a private cul-de-sac, convenience is nearby with Merrindale Shopping Centre within walking distance. Schools and parks are also close by in this quiet court location with the amenities of central Croydon easily reached by car or bus. The fantastic location pales in comparison to the home, this is a once in a lifetime opportunity to secure a unique, historically significant home and plant new roots for your family.
